skills.name: Pierce Soul
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times to decrease the Defense for 2 turns with a 30% chance each and disturbs the HP recovery.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +15%

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Brand of Hell
skills.description: Attacks the enemy three times, with each attack having a 50% chance to receive a Branding effect for 2 turns. The damage increases as the enemy's HP becomes lower.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Brand
skill_effect.description: Enemies with Branding Effect take 25% more Damage

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark>*(-2.2*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Target's HP percentage in range 0 to 1, with 1 being full HP.">Target Current HP %</mark> + 4.4)

skills.name: Secret of Eternal Life
skills.description: Removes all harmful effects on all allies and recovers their HP by 30% of your MAX HP. Revives all dead allies with 30% HP if there's any defeated ally but the skill cooldown will be increased by 2 turns for each revived ally.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target
